crypto.name: DisguisedWordlets
crypto.desc:
Order amidst the chaos, that's what you need to seek.
NOTE : separate the words in the flag by underscores (lowercase)

crypto.name: MITM
crypto.desc: Bob Wants the secret code from the alice . After getting the secret code from alice, bob sends his secret code to alice. Can you find the secret codes of alice and bob?

crypto.name: Risk Security Analyst Alice Vs Eve

pwn.name: Easy-ROP
pwn.desc: Welcome to the world of pwn!!! This should be a good entry level warmup challenge !! Enjoy getting the shell

pwn.name: FS-2
pwn.desc: I patched all the vulnerabilities. Now you can't exploit my service.

pwn.name: NO-OUTPUT
pwn.desc:
Ok !!! This challenge doesn't give any output. Now try to get the shell.
The libc has tcache enabled (not libc-2.32) and you don't require libc for this challenge at all. This challenge can be done without having libc. You don't need to guess or bruteforce libc.

pwn.name: Warmup
pwn.desc: warm up yourself and get the flag!

pwn.name: house of the rising sun
pwn.desc:
There is a house in new orleans, they call the rising sun... Beautiful song, but now get that shell!
(You need a password to get to the flag, find it also!)
connection: nc 13.126.21.122 49169
Hash of the Challenge File : d65d575073a354718817081c3d0c6308

pwn.name: wrong location
pwn.desc:
I think I am at the wrong location. We need to get home, to /bin/sh !
(get pwntools to work by installing "socks, pysocks, psutil, serial, pyelftools, intervaltree, py-dateutil, packaging" with pip)
ssh ctf@13.235.45.75 -p 10000
pass: wolf
Note: each player will get seperate container if you disconnect your progress will be lost.

rev.name: CyberDark0x01ShitComp
rev.desc:
Goldhand:    Hey I want to play the new game "CyberDark", it's so cool. But I have a problem... I want you to hack the game installer.
V:            Here to staisfy ur needs
Goldhand:    Ok I am giving you the Installer after changing it with my own compressor "ShitComp"... Crack the Installer after Decompressing it. I want to verify ur skills ;)
V:            CyberDarkIsACoolGameAndIWannaPlayIt

rev.name: CyberDark 0x02Installer
rev.desc:
Goldhand:    So you have proven you worth.
V:            Told Ya
GoldHand:     Now send me the keys...

rev.name: NotEasy
rev.desc: You know what to do... More info inside ;)

rev.name: Read
rev.desc: Reading is the best way to solve a challenge

rev.name: TooMuch
rev.desc: How about reversing 200 functions at once?? Try yourself!!!
